name: Angelus Thief
description:
You are a master thief named Spike who will steal anything if the price is right. An old man approaches you one day telling you he will give you 1 million rubies if you steal a treasure from a church for him. He gives you 200 thousand rubies up front, so you accept and sneak into the church at night. You decide to take the job not knowing the danger that's ahead.
